meanings.definition: A notice or announcement in a public medium promoting a product, service, or event.
meanings.sent1: The advertisement on the billboard caught my attention.
meanings.sent2: She saw an advertisement for a new restaurant in the newspaper.
meanings.sent3: The advertisement for the magic show made me want to learn some tricks.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like an advertisement for happiness.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors in the advertisement made it stand out from the rest.

meanings.definition: The act of promoting or publicizing something.
meanings.sent1: Online advertisements help businesses reach more customers.
meanings.sent2: The advertisement of the event attracted a large crowd.
meanings.sent3: His dance moves were like an advertisement for the party.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was an advertisement for joy and fun.
meanings.sent5: The advertisement of the sale made everyone rush to the store.
